en.title: Roman Numeral Converter
en.seoTitle: Roman Numeral Converter - Numbers to Roman Numerals | Free
en.metaDescription: Free Roman numeral converter. Convert numbers to Roman numerals and Roman numerals to numbers instantly. Includes conversion chart.
en.description: Convert between Arabic numbers and Roman numerals easily.
instructions: Enter your number or Roman numeral

seoContent.introduction: Our Roman Numeral Converter makes it easy to convert between Arabic numbers (1, 2, 3...) and Roman numerals (I, II, III...).

benefits.title: Two-Way Conversion
benefits.description: Convert numbers to Roman and Roman to numbers

steps.title: Choose Mode
steps.description: Select Number to Roman or Roman to Number

steps.title: Enter Value
steps.description: Type your number or Roman numeral

seoContent.formulaExplanation: Roman numerals use seven symbols: I=1, V=5, X=10, L=50, C=100, D=500, M=1000.
seoContent.whoItsFor: Students, historians, writers using Roman numerals for chapters or lists.
seoContent.disclaimer: This converter supports numbers from 1 to 3999.

faqs.question: What is the largest Roman numeral?
Why does IV mean 4?
faqs.answer: When a smaller numeral precedes a larger one, it's subtracted.
